goal.ch: 此課程規劃並教授5個機械量測主題，著重在特定量測主題的基礎原理陳述及實際應用，而這些主題都出於量測技術及頻譜分析的基礎與其應用。
goal.en: The content of this course consists of 5 mechanical measurement topics, emphasized on fundamental principles and their applications in individual topic laboratories.  Particularly, they all originate from and relate to the basis and application of measurement technique and spectral analysis.

outline.ch:
主題1: 感測器與量測系統校正；以精密麥克風 及 振動加速規 為例。討論分貝(dB)的定義。
主題2: 動態訊號(如振動訊號、機械噪音 等)之量測與頻譜分析(訊號之傅立葉分析)；以及心理聲學與音響權值(weighting)計算簡介、及簡易噪音計製作原理陳述。
主題3: 旋轉系統靜態(單面)、動態(雙面)平衡校正之原理、與平衡校正設備設計原則。
主題4: 以強度調變(幅值調變)光源輸入介質，解調變後估測輸出光與入射光的光程相位差。
主題5: 激振器之使用、懸臂樑及薄板自然頻率之量測、計算、及結構振型估測
方式1— 模態測試原理與實驗；
方式2— 運轉位移形狀原理與實驗。
outline.en:
Topic 1: Calibration of sensors and measurement systems; Using precision microphone and vibration accelerometers as examples; Definition and discussion of decibel (dB) in varied ways.
Topic 2: Fourier/Spectrum analysis of measured vibration signals and mechanical noise; Introduction to psychoacoustics (A, B, C, D weighting), and introduction to sound meter.
Topic 3: Static (single-plane) and dynamic (multiple-plane) balancing of rotary discs and machinery, and design principle of balance-adjusting instrumentation
Topic 4: Illuminate amplitude/intensity modulated light into medium to estimate phase differences (delays) between output-emitted and incident light through demodulation.
Topic 5: The use shakers to excite and estimate resonant frequencies of a beam and a plate. Mode shape estimation of structures
Approach 1— Modal testing
Approach 2— Operation deflection shape
